name: Shrek SuperSlam
description:
Shrek SuperSlam is an arcade-fighting game developed by LTI Gray Matter, Shaba Games and 7 Studios. It was originally released in 2005. It was published by Activision Blizzard. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Shrek SuperSlam is available on Xbox, Nintendo DS, GameCube and Game Boy Advance.
It was produced by DreamWorks Animation.
